sentences.en: Even now, having been tortured and imprisoned by Voldemort, the idea of the Dark wizard in possession of this wand seemed to enthrall him as much as it repulsed him.
sentences.cn: 现在，即使在被伏地魔拷问和关押后，这老头儿对于黑巫师拥有老魔杖的想法，似乎仍是既反感又着迷。

sentences.en: Hannibal Lecter: Enthrall me with your acumen.
sentences.cn: 汉尼拔: 施展一下你聪慧的魅力.

sentences.en: He was enthrall , enthraled by the story.
I am afraid I may frighten the company , frighten or enthrall them.
sentences.cn: 我怕我会吓坏那些人,吓坏了他们或是使他们迷惑不解.

sentences.en: Such trends do not enthrall neutrals, many of whom would prefer to see free-scoring Barcelona win tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 这些趋势并没有迷惑住中立者，他们中的很多人更愿意火力十足的巴萨明天赢球。

sentences.en: The author enthrall , enthralled the minds of his readers.
The author enthrall, enthralled the minds of his readers.
Why does the story of Moby Dick continue to enthrall generation after generation?
sentences.cn: 为何《白鲸记》的故事不断吸引一代又一代的读者 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 迷住；奴役；令人愉快（enthral的过去分词）
奴役；使…做奴隶；迷惑（等于enthrall）

trans.tran_cn: 迷惑, 迷住, 奴役
迷住，吸引住，使感到非常愉快
